title: Tower of Hanoi
subtitle: Classic puzzle game
instructionsText: Move all disks from the left peg to the right peg. You can only move one disk at a time and never place a larger disk on top of a smaller one.
winMessage: You solved the puzzle in {moves} moves and {time}!
clickPegFrom: Click the peg you want to move FROM
clickPegTo: Click the peg you want to move TO
invalidMove: Invalid move! You cannot place a larger disk on a smaller one.
noDiskToMove: No disk to move from this peg!
selectFromPeg: First select a peg to move from
footerDescription: A modern, open-source implementation of the classic puzzle game. Built with love using vanilla JavaScript.
openSourceText: This project is completely free and open source. Feel free to contribute, fork, or suggest improvements.
